name: Sniper Anti-Terrorist Pro
description:
Sniper Anti- Terrorist Pro is an terrorist hunting sniper game fully packed with action!
Set your scope and aim for the best shot. Get your best position on the roof of the buildings and shoot down those terrorists that have taken over the big city.
• Challenging & tactical missions
• Optimized graphics
• Eventful 3D immersive environment
• First Person Shooter (FPS) top action game
• Addictive 3D gameplay
